description: Some utilities (counters and pulse multiplexers) for menu based aplications. Also patches for the 20 x 4 i2c LCD display (now with cursor indicator opotion); the HP50827340 1 digit hexadecimal display and the Iduino Joystick Shield V1.A. Also there is a pulse decoder for rotary encoders and a patch to format an integer in n number of spaces, right justified.
name: utilities-for-menus

@/1to6-pulse-dispenser-with-overflow.description: A patch to assign an input pulse to one of six pssible outputs with overflow option to chain more dispensers.

BJHZb5wMH.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 3.
BJHZb5wMH.label: OUT3

H1fSZW5PGr.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 6.
H1fSZW5PGr.label: OUT6

H1nEW9PzH.description: Output of overflow (IDX - 6) count to additional pulse dispensers.
H1nEW9PzH.label: OVR

HJ7HWbqvGB.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX =2.
HJ7HWbqvGB.label: OUT2

Hy_Hb-cwzB.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 4.
Hy_Hb-cwzB.label: OUT4

S1UBbWcPfB.description: Index number to select the  output that will transmit the IN pulse.
S1UBbWcPfB.label: IDX

S1WHW-qDzS.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 5.
S1WHW-qDzS.label: OUT5

r1SHZZcvzS.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 1.
r1SHZZcvzS.label: OUT1

rywHZ-cwMS.description: The input pulse to be send to one of the outputs.

@/1to7-pulse-dispenser.description: A patch to assign an input pulse to one of seven pssible outputs.

ByFdYf50V.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 3.
ByFdYf50V.label: OUT3

HJNAtfq0E.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 5.
HJNAtfq0E.label: OUT5

SJBk9GqAN.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 6.
SJBk9GqAN.label: OUT6

SJjPtzc0E.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX =2.
SJjPtzc0E.label: OUT2

SkIQtm9AN.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 7.
SkIQtm9AN.label: OUT7

SkZvCOzqAV.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 1.
SkZvCOzqAV.label: OUT1

SyLpFf9A4.description: Index number to select the  output that will transmit the IN pulse.
SyLpFf9A4.label: IDX

rJ7P0Of5C4.description: The input pulse to be sended to one of the outputs.

rkatFG9RV.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on IN and IDX = 4.
rkatFG9RV.label: OUT4

@/2to3-pulse-dispenser-with-overflow.description: A patch to assign two input pulses to one of three pssible outputs each with overflow option to chain more dispensers.

B1ZHh9wzH.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InA and IDX = 2.
B1ZHh9wzH.label: OA2

B1fbSn9DMr.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InB and IDX = 3.
B1fbSn9DMr.label: OB3

Bkvbr25DfS.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InB and IDX = 2.
Bkvbr25DfS.label: OB2

HJOZHhqDzr.description: Output of overflow (IDX - 3) count to additional pulse dispensers.
HJOZHhqDzr.label: OVR

HyPq25DzH.description: The input pulse to be send to one of the B outputs.
HyPq25DzH.label: InB

r18WS3qwMS.description: The input pulse to be send to one of the A outputs.
r18WS3qwMS.label: InA

r1b-r35PGH.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InA and IDX = 3.
r1b-r35PGH.label: OA3

rkHWH2cDMS.description: Index number to select the  output that will transmit the IN pulse.
rkHWH2cDMS.label: IDX

rkVWHh9wzH.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InA and IDX = 1.
rkVWHh9wzH.label: OA1

ryXWHncwMH.description: Pulse out when there is a pulse on InB and IDX =1.
ryXWHncwMH.label: OB1

@/hp50827340.description: A patch to decode a number from 0 to 15 to be sended in 4 bit form to the HP50827340 single digit hexadecimal display.

ByMBkWp3N.description: Decimal number from 0 to 15  to be displayed on one HP50827340 Hexadecimal 1 digit display.
ByMBkWp3N.label: Data In

HJ-faKTxRN.description: Value to add on each increment or to substract on each decrement.
HJ-faKTxRN.label: STEP

SJzzTKTx0V.description: Resets the accumulated value to zero.
SJzzTKTx0V.label: RST

@/inc-dec-count-with-limits.description: A bidirectional counter with limits and a user definable reset value.

HyOBZ2ZRN.description: The value the count gets when there is a pulse on RST
HyOBZ2ZRN.label: INIT

SJ-qs0plAE.description: Value to add on each increment or to substract on each decrement.
SJ-qs0plAE.label: STEP

rkMci0Tx04.description: Resets the accumulated value to the INIT value
rkMci0Tx04.label: RST

@/joystick-shield.description: A decoder patch for the IDUINO Joystick Shield V1.A.

@/lcd-keypad-keys.description: A decoder patch for the keys on the LCD Key Pad Shield.

B1HbsuYwMB.description: IC address of the expander chip.
B1HbsuYwMB.label: ADDR

H1l3PI21Nr.description: IC address of the expander chip.
H1l3PI21Nr.label: ADDR

@/rotary-encoder-pulses.description: A patch to decode a rotary encoder INC and DEC pulses.

SJaCpnkEB.description: Number of digits in final result.
SJaCpnkEB.label: W

SJZpRa2J4r.description: Input number to format, must be an integer.

@/pad-with-spaces-int.description: Format an integer to n number of digits, right justified.
